title: club for katarina mains
body: as the title says, decided to make a club for kat mains, any1 wanting to join feel free to add me.

replies.body: If NIGHTS is in the club. It means that the kat club is OFFICIA;L!!!!!

why would someone with 1m+ kat points but only diamond 5 to make a kat club official,
i already have hailblazer and little kop is a far better than any other kat that has been on oce.
